main.name: Vijay Tadimeti
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: I'm currently a CS graduate student at Oregon State University, Corvallis. I'm in the Software Innovation Track (MSSWI) at OSU with Dr. Chris Scaffidi as my lead mentor and advisor. At MSSWI we primarily work on conceptualizing, designing, developing and evaluating software. I primarily work with JavaScript, NodeJs, ReactJs, Express, MySQL, MongoDB, Ruby-on-Rails. For a full list check out my resume. If you'd like to talk to me about anything you're passionate about or want to collaborate with me on any project ideas that you have, feel free to reach out to me over email.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Coursework: Analysis of Algorithms, Software Engineering Methods, Software Project Management, Database Management   Systems (DBMS), Human-Computer Interaction(HCI), Inclusive Design, Machine Learning, Data Analysis

work.title: Oregon State University
work.description: Worked as teaching assistant for the following classes -  CS 493(Cloud application development), CS 290 (Web Development), CS 362(Software Engineering II), CS 464 (Free and Open Source Software). Assisted students in developing projects that implement TDD, RESTful APIs, Micro services and server side web development through Node.Js, Express, Postgres and guided them to 100% completion.

work.title: Oregon State University
work.description: Conceptualized and Implemented the Teaching Assignment system to optimally match teaching assistants to classes which uses Integer Linear Prgramming (ILP).

work.title: IQVIA Inc.
work.description: Developed ​web-based solutions, configured and administered custom CRM ​dashboards for customers from Pharmaceutical, and consumer health companies. Developed application ​services that allowed medical representatives to gather and upload pharma data to IQVIAs proprietary ETL platforms.
